name: Noblesse Oblige
title: The Past: Noblesse Oblige
desc: "They were noble not only in lineage, but also in their commitment to virtues and principles.\nThe longevity of the nobles was cut short by their endless self-indulgence. Ostentation gave way to devolution."
in_play_description:
When played: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
After the character to which this is attached uses an Elemental Burst: Your characters deal +1 DMG the next 3 times they deal DMG.
